matches.reasoning: The bank entry for Honey Inc. on 01/01/2025 matches the GL entries on the same date with the same amount of $1050. The descriptions indicate a payment for robots, aligning with the bank description.
The bank entry for Bee Inc. on 01/02/2025 matches the GL entries on the same date with the same amount of $1100. The descriptions indicate a payment for robots, aligning with the bank description.

The bank entry for Goodies Inc. on 01/07/2025 matches the GL entry on the same date with the same amount of $2000. The description indicates a partial payment for bots, aligning with the bank description.
The bank entry for Baddies on 01/08/2025 matches the GL entry on the same date with the same amount of $2000. The description indicates a payment for bots, aligning with the bank description.

The bank entry for Goodies Inc. on 01/09/2025 matches the GL entry on the same date with the same amount of $3000. The description indicates a remaining payment for bots, aligning with the bank description.

The bank entry for Kings Inc. on 01/13/2025 matches the GL entry on 01/11/2025 with the same amount of $1000. The description indicates a payment for bots, but the date discrepancy suggests a low confidence match.
The bank entry for K-Foods on 01/13/2025 with an amount of -$100 does not have a corresponding GL entry. The negative amount and lack of matching description suggest no match.
